name: Yang: Race For The Presidency 2020
description:
In a divided nation with no dividends, bolt through hordes of self-driving cars bogging down Pennsylvania Avenue on the way to the White House. Play as protagonist, and 2020 Democratic presidential nominee Andrew Yang. Help yourself to $1000 bank notes along the way and secure the bag for the American people. Yang: Race For The Presidency 2020.
   Yang: Race For The Presidency is a humorous casual endless runner infused with Yang Gang memes. All proceeds made by this game totaling over $1000 per month will be donated to Andrew Yang's campaign. There will be a mobile version coming to PlayStore and potentially IOS in the near future, although it seems to work on some phones through itch.
